steps.title: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the flour, baking powder, and salt until well-combined.
steps.content: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the flour, baking powder, and salt until well-combined.

steps.title: Pour in the water and milk.
steps.content: Pour in the water and milk. Whisk until the batter is smooth.

steps.title: Use the fish batter.
steps.content: Use the fish batter. Dip fish fillets into the batter and fry until they're fully cooked.

steps.title: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the flour, baking powder, pepper, and salt until well-combined.
steps.content: In a medium-sized bowl, whisk the flour, baking powder, pepper, and salt until well-combined.

steps.title: Pour in the milk.
steps.content: Pour in the milk. Whisk until well-combined.

steps.title: Crack in the egg and continue to whisk until the batter is smooth.
steps.content: Crack in the egg and continue to whisk until the batter is smooth.

steps.title: Use the fish batter.
steps.content: Use the fish batter. Dip fish fillets into the batter and fry until they're fully cooked.

steps.title: In a large bowl, sift the dry ingredients.
steps.content: In a large bowl, sift the dry ingredients.

steps.title: Pour in the water and whisk until smooth.
steps.content: Pour in the water and whisk until smooth.

steps.title: Use the fish batter.
steps.content: Use the fish batter. Dip fish fillets into the batter and fry until they're fully cooked.
